                    NOTE:

 Macedonian composer, keyboardist, vocalist, producer and graphic designer from Skopja.
She studied music production, mastering engineering and recording and spent two years as an assistant to Valentino Skenderovski, the owner Studio Enterprise, Skopje.
She is known for lounge and chillout music, which she describes as "in the middle of the road between Balkan folk music and the rhythm of modern music..."
She now has her own Studio "Living Room" in Skopje, and owns a graphic design company, Artlab, and a label, M-Sol Records.
